trans-unit.source: Represents the parameters for supporting security tokens required by the security binding element.
This class is a collection of token properties and methods, and is used in creating security binding elements and tokens.
trans-unit.target: このクラスは、トークン用プロパティとメソッドのコレクションであり、セキュリティ バインディング用の要素とトークンの作成に使用されます。

trans-unit.source: Supporting tokens specify encryption and signing requirements.
trans-unit.target: サポート トークンは、暗号化と署名の要件を指定します。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters" /> class.
The new instance property values are set to their defaults:
trans-unit.target: 新しいインスタンス プロパティには既定値が設定されます。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.InclusionMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenInclusionMode.AlwaysToRecipient>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.InclusionMode%2A> が <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenInclusionMode.AlwaysToRecipient> に設定されます。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.ReferenceStyle%2A> is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenReferenceStyle.Internal>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.ReferenceStyle%2A> が <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenReferenceStyle.Internal> に設定されます。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.RequireDerivedKeys%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.RequireDerivedKeys%2A> が `true` に設定されます。

trans-unit.source: Clones another instance of this instance of the class.
A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters" />.
Clones another instance of this instance of the class.
A new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters" />.
Gets a collection of security token parameters for endorsing supporting tokens required by the security binding element.
A collection of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters" />.
Endorsing tokens sign the message signature.
trans-unit.target: 保証トークンは、メッセージ署名を行います。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> that determines whether parameters require derived keys.
Sets a value that indicates whether all endorsing or signed endorsing token parameters require derived keys.

Each <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters> in <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters.Endorsing%2A> or in <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters.SignedEndorsing%2A> has its <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.RequireDerivedKeys%2A> property set to `requireDerivedKeys`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters> または <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters.Endorsing%2A> の各 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters.SignedEndorsing%2A> で、<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.RequireDerivedKeys%2A> プロパティが `requireDerivedKeys` に設定されます。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of security token parameters for signed supporting tokens required by the security binding element.
A collection of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters" />.
Signed tokens are included in the message signature.
trans-unit.target: 署名付きトークンは、メッセージ署名に含まれます。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of security token parameters for signed and encrypted supporting tokens required by the security binding element.
A collection of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters" />.
Signed tokens are included in the message signature and are encrypted.
trans-unit.target: 署名付きトークンは、メッセージ署名に含まれ、暗号化されます。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of security token parameters for signed and endorsing supporting tokens required by the security binding element.
A collection of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters" />.
Signed endorsing tokens sign the message signature token and are themselves signed by the message signature.
trans-unit.target: 署名付き保証サポート トークンはメッセージ署名を行うトークンであり、それ自体がメッセージ署名で署名されます。

trans-unit.source: Displays a text representation of this instance of the class.
A text representation of this instance of this class.

The output string displays the result of performing the `ToString()` method on each of the tokens in <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters.Endorsing%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters.Signed%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters.SignedEncrypted%2A>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters.SignedEndorsing%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 出力文字列は、`ToString()`、<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters.Endorsing%2A>、<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters.Signed%2A>、および <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters.SignedEncrypted%2A> の各トークンに対する <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters.SignedEndorsing%2A> メソッドの実行結果を表示します。
